item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This page introduces the project setup and folder structure. Install Hugo Clone this repository Run hugo server

item.title: Usage
item.description: Learn how to use the features of this project. hugo new posts/my-first-post.md hugo server -D

item.title: The Beginnings
item.description: The start of a new chapter.

item.title: Vikas Chandra Thorian
item.description: Designer, writer, and builder — I make ideas useful.

item.title: My Fucking Resume
item.description: Thorian, Vikas Chandra Thought and Transformation enemy.at.gates@gmail.com | https://ytsief.com | linkedin/thorianvc | facebook/enemyatgates | github/enemyatgates I design product experiences and write about human systems. I have experience in product design, writing, and building early-stage ventures. I build with a focus on emotional intelligence and narrative-first experiences. Experience Founder & Product — Reverie (self) (2024-05 — Present) Built MVP for emotionally intelligent social product.Led product, design, and early growth. Senior Designer — Acme Co (2020-02 — 2024-04) Designed complex dashboards and enterprise experiences. Education MS in Computer Science — Example University [2019] Skills Product Design, Technical Writing, Hugo, Markdown

item.title: The Code Snippet
item.description: The Code baseURL = "/" title = "Modnar Musings" theme = "HugoBook" languageCode = "en-us" canonifyURLs = true relativeURLs = false [params] HideCopyright = true ShowBreadCrumbs = true ShowBreadCrumbsInPost = true ShowCodeCopyButtons = true ShowPostNavLinks = true ShowReadingTime = true ShowShareButtons = true ShowSidebar = true ShowToc = true TocOpen = true dateFormat = "Monday, January 02, 2006 @ 15:04:05 MST" defaultTheme = "auto" disableThemeToggle = false BookSection = "documents" BookLogo = "images/logo.png" [menu] [[menu.main]] name = "Home" url = "/" weight = 1 [[menu.main]] name = "Blog" url = "/blog/" weight = 2 [[menu.main]] name = "About" url = "/about/" weight = 3 [[menu.main]] name = "Posts" url = "/posts/" weight = 4 [params.assets] customCSS = ["css/custom.css"] [markup] [markup.goldmark] [markup.goldmark.renderer] unsafe = true #[params.homeInfoParams] # Title = "Welcome to Modnar Musings" # Content = "We build elegant, open-source digital experiences. Explore our writing, projects, and ideas."
